page.title: 03INTERVIEW - BROWN FARM
page.content:
In this area all the farms are of roughly the same size _ between 80 and 110 hectares . Brown Farm is organic (they cannot use artificial fertilisers and sprays) so all the land is sown grass and intensively cultivated. In this area sheep and beef cattle are reared. Brown Farm carries 100 head of cattle but the other farms in the area only have 20 or 30. Each farm also has about 200 sheep . Once a year replacement calves and ewes are bought from the neighbouring farms.
Brown Farm is slightly unusual in that it raises dairy cattle for a farmer in the valley. This farm is run by the family with very little outside help and all the annual work (sheep dipping, shearing etc.) is shared by all the local farms.
